meanings: big, large, [상당히] very, much, far, greatly, heavily, largely, badly, seriously, considerably, highly, remarkably, exceedingly, [대대적으로] vastly, hugely, a great deal, to a great extent, [대규모로] on a large [grand] scale, in a large [big] way, in a large measure [degree].

vlive.korean: 너무 크게 썰었나 내가? 다질까요 그냥?
vlive.english: Are these too big? Should I dice them?

vlive.korean: 키보드 소리 진짜 크게 들리는 거?
vlive.english: That the keyboard sounds are so loudly heard?
"Please sing louder". I am not so confident.

examples.english: She had no great yearning to go back.

examples.korean: 그의 뺨에는 보라색 흉터가 크게 나 있었다.
examples.english: A large purple scar marked his cheek.
Cigarette smoking multiplies the risk of cancer.

examples.korean: 지붕이 높아서 소리가 더 크게 들렸다.
examples.english: The sound was magnified by the high roof.
He was very successful in his middle forties.
